data.description:
- This is a relaxing zoo experience with over 140 high detailed animals to see and 60 jungle plants.
- Mixed reality and hand tracking areas allow you to create a zoo home, along with jungle environments.
- ZOSU Zoo Land and 30 ZOSU Ocean levels are waiting for you to explore in classic VR (controller use only).

Animals include: lions, sharks, dinosaurs, clown fish, pre-historic fish, bears, wolves, elephants, rhinos, whales, crocodiles, chickens, tigers, octopus, whales, dolphins, horses, cats, dogs, star fish, leopard, cuttlefish, zebras, owls, seals, lion fish, lizards, goats, sun fish, squid, and many more!

This game received a major update in July 2024 for mixed reality + hand tracking and ocean exploration levels, these updates are available for all version except Quest1 (Quest1 will continue to only have the original ZOSU Zoo land)

changelog.change_log: Added dolphin mixed reality + hand tracking area.  Added deer with interactive logic to walk and take action near each other in the zoo land.  Fixed bugs in the zoo and large fish copy areas. Performance improvement in the zoo land area.
Added large fish select and duplicate level, also minor bug and performance improvements.
Added jungle mixed reality hand track areas and large animal selection area, also minor bug and performance improvements.

Major update: added mixed reality and hand tracking areas to create a zoo in your home with tabletop and full sized animals, as well as jungle areas. With the current build in some areas animals and plants can be duplicated while in other areas their position can be saved. Also added 30 ZOSU Ocean exploration levels.
improved water animal spawns, performance improvement, added animal spawns, minor bug fix.
Added 5 new animals, increased amount animal spawns, fixed bugs, improved animations, added paintings.
